summary: MY SON WAS KILLED IN AN AUTO ACCIDENT.  HE WAS THE DRIVER.  THE SHOULDER HARNESS BROKE LOOSE FROM THE DOOR FRAME.  HIS CAR WAS A 1993 FORD ESCORT WITH AUTOMATIC SHOULDER HARNESS.  THE SHOULDER HARNESS ASSEMBLY STAYED IN THE DOOR FRAME, BUT THE PART THAT HOLDS THE SHOULDER HARNESS IN THE UNIT BROKE. TS
